title: Plasmonic photon sorters for spectral and polarimetric imaging
title_cn: 等离子光子分选仪，用于光谱和偏振成像
abstract: Colour cameras mimic the human eye and record only a small part of the information contained in the incoming light. Modern image sensing techniques, which subdivide the light spectrally or record information about the polarization of the incoming light, can extract much more information for applications ranging from biological studies to remote sensing. Spectral imaging techniques typically rely on filters or interferometers combined with scanning or subsampling to record a spectral image ‘cube’ (which has wavelength as a third dimension). This leads to inefficient use of the incoming light and/or long recording times. Here, we show that surface plasmons enable direct recording of spectral image cubes in a single exposure. By texturing metal surfaces at the nanometre scale, incoming light is converted to surface plasmons and can then be separated according to wavelength and polarization, before being recoupled to light through subwavelength apertures that illuminate individual photodetector elements. This photon-sorting capability provides a new approach for spectral and polarimetric imaging with extremely compact device archictures.
abstract_cn: 彩色摄像头模仿人眼并仅记录入射光中包含的一小部分信息。现代的图像传感技术可以对光谱进行细分或记录有关入射光偏振的信息，可以提取更多的信息，用于从生物学研究到遥感的各种应用。光谱成像技术通常依靠滤镜或干涉仪结合扫描或二次采样来记录光谱图像。 （其波长为三维）。这导致入射光的利用效率低和/或记录时间长。在这里，我们表明表面等离激元能够在单次曝光中直接记录光谱图像立方。通过在纳米级对金属表面进行纹理化处理，入射光会转换为表面等离激元，然后可以根据波长和偏振进行分离，然后再通过照射单个光电探测器元件的亚波长孔径与光耦合。这种光子分选功能为具有极其紧凑的设备结构的光谱和偏振成像提供了一种新方法。

title: A femtosecond X-ray/optical cross-correlator
title_cn: 飞秒X射线/光学互相关器
abstract: For a fundamental understanding of ultrafast dynamics in chemistry, biology and materials science it has been a long-standing dream to record a molecular movie in which both the atomic trajectories and the chemical states of every atom in matter are followed in real time. Free-electron lasers provide this perspective as they deliver brilliant femtosecond X-ray pulses spanning a wide photon energy range, which is necessary to gather element-specific and chemical-state-selective information with femtosecond time resolution. The key challenge lies in synchronizing the free-electron lasers with separate optical lasers. We exploit the peak brilliance of the free-electron laser in Hamburg (FLASH) and establish X-ray- pulse-induced transient changes of the optical reflectivity in GaAs as a powerful tool for X-ray/optical cross-correlation. This constitutes a breakthrough in the path towards recording a molecular movie and—equally importantly—opens up the field of femtosecond X-ray-induced dynamics, only accessible with high-brilliance X-ray free-electron lasers.
abstract_cn: 要对化学，生物学和材料科学中的超快动力学有一个基本的了解，记录分子电影是一个长期的梦想，在该电影中实时跟踪物质中每个原子的原子轨迹和化学状态。自由电子激光器提供了这种观点，因为它们发出了跨越很宽光子能量范围的出色飞秒X射线脉冲，这对于以飞秒时间分辨率收集特定于元素和化学状态选择性的信息是必不可少的。关键挑战在于使自由电子激光器与单独的光学激光器同步。我们利用汉堡（FLASH）中的自由电子激光的峰值亮度，并建立X射线脉冲诱导的GaAs光学反射率瞬态变化，作为进行X射线/光学互相关的有力工具。这构成了录制分子电影的道路上的突破，并且同样重要的是，打开了飞秒X射线诱导的动力学领域，只有高亮度X射线自由电子激光器才能实现。 >

title: A cascaded silicon Raman laser
abstract: One of the major advantages of Raman lasers is their ability to generate coherent light in wavelength regions that are not easily accessible with other conventional types of lasers. Recently, efficient Raman lasing in silicon in the near-infrared region has been demonstrated, showing great potential for realizing low-cost, compact, room-temperature lasers in the mid-infrared region. Such lasers are highly desirable for many applications, ranging from trace-gas sensing, environmental monitoring and biomedical analysis, to industrial process control, and free-space communications. Here we report the first experimental demonstration of cascaded Raman lasing in silicon, opening the path to extending the lasing wavelength from the near- to mid-infrared region. Using a 1,550-nm pump source, we achieve stable, continuous-wave, second-order cascaded lasing at 1,848 nm with an output power exceeding 5 mW. The laser operates in single mode, and the laser linewidth is measured to be <2.5 MHz.
abstract_cn: 拉曼激光器的主要优点之一是它们能够在其他传统类型的激光器难以达到的波长范围内产生相干光。近来，已经证明了在近红外区域中硅中有效的拉曼激光发射，显示出在中红外区域中实现低成本，紧凑，室温激光器的巨大潜力。对于从痕量气体感测，环境监测和生物医学分析到工业过程控制以及自由空间通信的许多应用，这种激光器是非常需要的。在这里，我们报告硅中级联拉曼激光的第一个实验演示，这为从近红外到中红外区域扩展激光波长开辟了道路。使用1,550 nm的泵浦光源，我们可以在1,848 nm处实现稳定的连续波二阶级联激射，输出功率超过5 mW。激光器以单模运行，并且测得的激光线宽为＆lt; 2.5＆＃160; MHz。

title: Highly confined guiding of terahertz surface plasmon polaritons on structured metal surfaces
title_cn: 太赫兹表面等离激元极化子在结构化金属表面上的高度封闭导向
abstract: Metamaterials are artificial materials with subwavelength structure that enable the translation of magnetic and electric responses into spectral regions not accessible through naturally occurring materials. Here, we report direct measurements of the propagation and confinement of terahertz electromagnetic surface modes tightly bound to flat plasmonic metamaterials that consist of metal surfaces decorated with two-dimensional arrays of subwavelength-periodicity pits. These modes are surface plasmon polaritons with an effective plasma frequency controlled entirely by the surface geometry. The mode spectrum and penetration depth into air demonstrate strong wavelength-scale energy confinement to the surface below the electromagnetic band edge; this is in stark contrast to the very weak confinement found at flat metal surfaces in this spectral regime. The results are in good agreement with analytical and numerical models of surface plasmon polaritons propagating on structured perfect-conductor surfaces, and imply that plasmonic metamaterials could help miniaturize optical components or lead to improved chemical or biochemical sensors.
abstract_cn: 超材料是具有亚波长结构的人造材料，能够将磁响应和电响应转换为无法通过天然材料获得的光谱区域。在这里，我们报告直接测量的太赫兹电磁表面模式的传播和限制，它紧密地结合到平坦的等离子超材料，该材料由用亚波长周期性凹坑的二维阵列装饰的金属表面组成。这些模式是表面等离子体激元极化子，其有效等离子体频率完全由表面几何形状控制。模态光谱和对空气的渗透深度表明，强电磁波将能量限制在电磁带边缘以下的表面。这与在此光谱范围内在平坦金属表面上发现的非常弱的限制形成鲜明对比。结果与结构化理想导体表面上传播的表面等离激元极化子的分析模型和数值模型吻合良好，这表明等离激元超材料可以帮助使光学组件小型化或改进化学或生化传感器。

title: A nanoelectromechanical tunable laser
title_cn: 纳米机电可调谐激光器
abstract: The ability to tune the frequency of an oscillator is of critical importance and is a fundamental building block for many systems, be they mechanical or electronic. However, this very important function is still highly inadequate in optical oscillators, particularly in semiconductor laser diodes. The limitations in tuning a laser frequency (or wavelength) include the tuning range and the speed of tuning, which is typically milliseconds or slower. In addition, the tuning is often not continuous and may require complex synchronization of several electrical control signals. In this Letter, we present a new tunable laser structure with a lightweight nanoelectromechanical mirror based on a single-layer, high-contrast subwavelength grating. The high-contrast subwavelength grating reflector enables a drastic reduction of the mirror mass, which increases the mechanical resonant frequency and hence tuning speed. This allows for a wavelength-tunable light source with potential switching speeds of the order of tens of nanoseconds and suggests various new areas of practical application, such as bio- or chemical sensing, chip-scale atomic clocks and projection displays.
abstract_cn: 调谐振荡器频率的能力至关重要，对于许多系统（无论是机械系统还是电子系统），它都是一个基本的构建模块。但是，这个非常重要的功能在光学振荡器中，特别是在半导体激光二极管中，仍然非常不足。调谐激光频率（或波长）的限制包括调谐范围和调谐速度，通常为毫秒或更慢。另外，调谐通常不是连续的，并且可能需要几个电控制信号的复杂同步。在这封信中，我们介绍了一种新型的可调谐激光器结构，该结构具有基于单层高对比度亚波长光栅的轻型纳米机电镜。高对比度的亚波长光栅反射器可大幅减少镜面质量，从而提高机械共振频率，从而提高调谐速度。这允许波长可调的光源具有数十纳秒量级的潜在开关速度，并提出了各种实际应用的新领域，例如生物或化学传感，芯片级原子钟和投影显示器。

title: Picosecond and low-power all-optical switching based on an organic photonic-bandgap microcavity
title_cn: 基于有机光子带隙微腔的皮秒和低功率全光开关
abstract: Photonic crystals, materials with periodic dielectric structures, are able to control the propagation states of photons owing to the so-called photonic-bandgap effect. Nonlinear photonic crystals, whose refractive-index distribution can be tuned optically, have been used to demonstrate all-optical switching. However, a high pump intensity is usually required because the nonlinear optical coefficient of conventional materials is relatively small. Here we report ultrafast and low-power photonic-crystal all-optical switching based on strong optical nonlinearity enhancement due to excited-state interelectron transfer. Compared with the case without nonlinearity enhancement, the switching operation power is reduced by four orders of magnitude while the ultrafast response time, of the order of a picosecond, is maintained. This provides a strategy for constructing photonic materials with large nonlinearity and studying ultrafast low-power integrated photonic devices.
abstract_cn: 由于具有所谓的光子带隙效应，具有周期性介电结构的材料光子晶体能够控制光子的传播状态。 非线性光子晶体的折射率分布可以进行光学调整，已被用于演示全光转换。 然而，由于传统材料的非线性光学系数相对较小，因此通常需要高泵浦强度。 在这里，我们报告了由于激发态电子间转移而产生的强烈的光学非线性增强作用，从而实现了超快，低功耗的光子晶体全光开关。 与没有非线性增强的情况相比，开关操作功率降低了四个数量级，同时保持了皮秒级的超快响应时间。 这为构造具有大非线性的光子材料和研究超快低功耗集成光子器件提供了一种策略。</ p>

title: Non-scanning motionless fluorescence three-dimensional holographic microscopy
title_cn: 非扫描静止荧光三维全息显微镜
abstract: Holography is an attractive imaging technique as it offers the ability to view a complete three-dimensional volume from one image. However, holography is not widely applied to the field of three-dimensional fluorescence microscopic imaging, because fluorescence is incoherent and creating holograms requires a coherent interferometer system. Although scanning one beam of an interferometer pattern across the rear aperture of an objective to excite fluorescence in a specimen overcomes the coherence limitation, the mechanical scanning is complicated, which makes the image capturing slow, and the process is limited to low-numerical-aperture objectives. Here we present the first demonstration of a motionless microscopy system (FINCHSCOPE) based on Fresnel incoherent correlation holography, and its use in recording high-resolution three-dimensional fluorescent images of biological specimens. By using high-numerical-aperture objectives, a spatial light modulator, a CCD camera and some simple filters, FINCHSCOPE enables the acquisition of three-dimensional microscopic images without the need for scanning.
abstract_cn: 全息照相术是一种有吸引力的成像技术，因为它提供了从一个图像查看完整的三维空间的能力。然而，由于荧光不相干并且全息图的产生需要相干干涉仪系统，因此全息术并未广泛应用于三维荧光显微成像领域。尽管在物镜的后孔上扫描干涉仪图案的一束光以激发样品中的荧光克服了相干性限制，但是机械扫描很复杂，这使得图像捕获速度很慢，并且该过程仅限于低数值孔径目标。在这里，我们介绍基于菲涅耳非相干相关全息技术的静止显微镜系统（FINCHSCOPE）的首次演示，并将其用于记录生物标本的高分辨率三维荧光图像。通过使用高数值孔径的物镜，空间光调制器，CCD相机和一些简单的滤镜，FINCHSCOPE无需扫描即可获取三维显微图像。
